0C225E21.Line13.B79B3: Then came Nafain, growling like a beast, slashing at Astaroth with fang and claw.

5D23008E.Line1.B79B3: The ash fell like rain, and Astaroth’s mad laughter boomed like thunder!

722DE49F.Line11.B79B3: First came Airidah, calling down a storm upon the demon’s head with music from her talharpa.

A616D7A3.Line15.B79B3: And last came Donan. He plunged his hand into the demon’s fiery chest...and crushed the fiend’s heart in his palm!

C6419F88.Line29.B79B3: A fierce wind blew out the flames! There, in the smoke, stood the three heroes. Even Astaroth trembled at the sight.

CC2C66BB.Big delivery, dramatic for his audience: :  like he is trying to scare his audience.

D9FFCAA7.Line19.B79B3: Astaroth let loose a cry that shook the forest to its roots, and then the monster crumbled into dust. So ended the Days of Ash!

F7177A10.Line3.B79B3: Folk tried to hide, but the demon sniffed them out. He herded them into a cage of fire, and as he prepared to eat them one by one...
